snippet.title: POKeMON Fusion Generation Trailer
snippet.description:
Oh dear...  It appears Nintendo gave this developer the Cease & Desist. I am so sorry, I was really looking forward to the sequel too.

I also have a Let's Play of this game you can find here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kqNBGOQp1SU

My digital tips jar : https://www.patreon.com/Hadriex
I'm on Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Hadriex/
I'm also on Minds.com: https://www.minds.com/Hadriex
And Twitter: https://twitter.com/Hadriex/
Hadriex Discord community: https://discord.gg/FFDSjch
